channel.title: Help With Chat And One Other Thing
channel.description:
Hello, I need some help. I need to know how i log all chat. I also need to know how to make a working report abuse menu.
Any help would be greatly appriceated.

item.title: Help With Chat And One Other Thing
item.dc:creator: @LoveScaper LoveScaper
item.description:
@LoveScaper wrote:

wow kevin good job i was about to ask the same question thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Chat And One Other Thing
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

add it in your case 4: //chat

BufferedWriter bw = null; //chatlogging(playerName, misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize-2))); //makes mods and up get a chatlog of kevinscape try { bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/chatlogs.txt", true)); // bw.write("["+playerName+"]: Text ["+chatTextEffects+","+chatTextColor+"]: "+misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize-2)); bw.write(playerName+": "+misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize-2)); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bw != null) try { bw.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { sendMessage("Error logging chat!"); }

Read full topic
item.source: Help With Chat And One Other Thing
